name: Dream Wires
description:
Dream Wires is a Yume Nikki fangame created by Madorep and Sniperbob (content currently on hold until further notice)

You play as A Protogen named Shigeru Thuvurg, as he explores and records his Dreams

The game currently has 5 effects and 8 nexus doors and a couple of worlds and events

(Its highly recommended that you use Easyrpg player for this game as other wise it will lag due to some pictures and or crash at times due to unindexed images)

This game was Created using Clockwork Prince's YNFG template and uses the maniac patch
